name: The Best Drifting Devil Slayer
description:
GTA 2 - Like created for the GamesPlusJam 2021 over a week, by a 1 man team (FanieG) from sunny South Africa (with a little help from friends).  Game was created in Unity for Windows and requires a keyboard and mouse to play.  The game uses several free sounds from freesound.org, the unity asset stores, and sound packs from previous jams entered.  The music is by Edward van der Merwe from Cape Town. The art was all made for the jam, with the exception of some of the enemy sprites, which is from a previous jam entered, and the 3d car model used which was a free asset.  The  Toon shader for the cars was provided by Darren Allison from Mbombela.

The game features:

* Insane driving action combined with classic 2D top-down-shooting.

* Enter and Exit any vehicle.

* Guns and grenades to bring down the underworld

* Dash Mechanic to get you out of a tight spot fast!

* Rudimentary day/night cycle enhanced with Unity 2D lighting. 

* 3 enemy types - posing a threat both on feet or when behind the wheel.

* Highscore system (local) - Get them flowers and evade the devils and demons.

* Mutable sound - cause sound design is hard (earphone users warned)

* Parody and satire for humor (there is an option in the main menu to remove this from your game - we don't judge and don't mean to offend - you have the choice)

* We hear bunnies like to hang aroung their "JamesPlusGames" easter eggs (Parody mode only).
